biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Hirsala Golf. His presence is always felt, bringing a unique blend of competitive spirit and camaraderie to the event.

Over the years, Jarkko has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on eight occasions, showcasing his dedication to the tournament. His experience and familiarity with the course dynamics make him a formidable competitor.

Jarkko's efforts have not gone unrewarded. He has emerged victorious, claiming the coveted Hector Trophée once, a testament to his skill and partnership abilities. Additionally, Jarkko has distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player by securing the Victor Trophy once.

As he prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, which will mark his ninth appearance, Jarkko remains an active and enthusiastic participant. His continued involvement underscores his passion for the sport and the unique challenges presented by the Hector Trophée.
